title: Alternative for Germany
summary: Alternative for Germany (German: Alternative für Deutschland, AfD; German pronunciation: [aːʔɛfˈdeː] (listen)) is a right-wing populist[2] political party in Germany.[3] A right-wing party,[4][5] AfD is known for its opposition to the European Union[6] and immigration to Germany.[7] It is positioned on the radical right, or far right, of the political spectrum within the family of European political parties.[8]
